#-----main-----

a, b = map(int, input().split())  #aとbを入力してint型に変換

if a <= b:   #aがb以下の時
    print(0)   #0を出力
else:
    print(a - b)  #a-bを出力

#-----main-----

a, b = map(int, input().split())

if a < b:
    print(str(a) + " is smaller than " + str(b))
elif a > b:
    print(str(a) + " is greater than " + str(b))
else:    #a == b
    print(str(a) + " is equal to " + str(b))

def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a - b)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a - b)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# -----main-----

a, b = map(int, input().split())

if a <= b:
    print(0)
else:
    print(a - b)
